original: <1.10/2> mudrayā sthiratā ca eva pratyāhāreṇa dhairyatā //1.10/
analyzed: mudrayā sthira tā ca eva pratyāhāreṇa dhairya tā

original: <1.25/1> yām ārdha+ +dhāraṇā+ +śaktim yāvat na sādhayet naraḥ /
analyzed: yām ārdha dhāraṇā śaktim yāvat na sādhayet naraḥ
iḍayā pūrayet vāyum recayet piṅgalā punar

original: <1.61/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghaṭa+ +stha+ +yoge ṣaṭ+ +karma+ +sādhanam nāma prathama+ +upadeśaḥ //1//
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghaṭa stha yoge ṣaṭkarma sādhanam nāma prathama upadeśaḥ
yoni sthānakam aṅghri mūla ghaṭitam saṃpīḍya gulpha itaram

original: <2.7/11> meḍhra+ +upari atha saṃnidhāya cibukam kṛtvā hṛdi sthāpitam /
analyzed: meḍhra upari atha saṃnidhāya cibukam kṛtvā hṛdi sthāpitam

original: <2.7/2> sthāṇuḥ saṃyamita+ +indriyaḥ a+ +cala+ +dṛśā paśyan bhruvoḥ antare /
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamita indriyaḥ a cala dṛśā paśyan bhruvoḥ antare
etat mokṣa kapāṭa bhedana karam siddha āsanam procyate

original: <2.8/1> vāmoḥ ūpari dakṣiṇam hi caraṇam saṃsthāpya vāmam tathā /
analyzed: vāmoḥ ūpari dakṣiṇam hi caraṇam saṃsthāpya vāmam tathā

original: <2.8/11> dakṣoḥ ūpari paścimena vidhinā kṛtvā karābhyām dṛḍham /
analyzed: dakṣoḥ ūpari paścimena vidhinā kṛtvā karābhyām dṛḍham

original: <2.8/2> aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukam nāsā+ +agram ālokayet /
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukam nāsā agram ālokayet
etat vyādhi vikāra nāśana karam padma āsanam procyate
karau ca pṛṣṭham dhṛta pāda yugmam
yoga indra pīṭham paścima tānam āhuḥ
bahu kat aśana bhuktam bhasma kuryāt a śeṣam
janayati jaṭhara agnim jārayet kāla kūṭam
harati sa kala rogān āśu gulma jvara ādīn
bhavati vigata doṣam hi āsanam śrī mayūram

original: <2.39/3> pādau ca śūnye ca vitasti ca ūrdhvam /
analyzed: pādau ca śūnye ca vitasti ca ūrdhvam
śiraḥ ca dhṛtvā kara daṇḍa yugme
deha agni kāram makara āsanam tat
ākuñcya samyak ghi udara āsya gaṇḍam

original: <2.46/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghata+ +stha+ +yoge āsana+ +prayogaḥ nāma dvitīya+ +upadeśaḥ //2// ]]
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghata stha yoge āsana prayogaḥ nāma dvitīya upadeśaḥ
yāvat gacchet bhruvoḥ madhye tadā sidhyati khecarī
hum ham sa manunā su dhīḥ
brahma hā bhrūṇa hā ca eva
ūrdhvam kṣipet pāda yugam śiraḥ khe

original: saḥ ca brahma na ca anyathā //3.67/
analyzed: saḥ ca brahma na ca anyathā
yat tattvam hari tāla deśa racitam bhaumam la kāra anvitam

original: <3.70/11> veda+ +āsram kamala+ +āsanena sahitam kṛtvā hṛdi sthāyinam /
analyzed: veda āsram kamala āsanena sahitam kṛtvā hṛdi sthāyinam

original: <3.70/2> prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca+ +ghaṭikāḥ citta+ +anvitam dhārayet /
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet

original: <3.70/3> eṣā stambha+ +karī sadā kṣiti+ +jayam kuryāt adhaḥ+ +dhāraṇā //3.70/
analyzed: eṣā stambha karī sadā kṣiti jayam kuryāt adhaḥ dhāraṇā

original: <3.72/1> śaṅkha+ +indu+ +pratimam ca kunda+ +dhavalam tattvam kilālam śubham /
analyzed: śaṅkha indu pratimam ca kunda dhavalam tattvam kilālam śubham
tat pīyūṣa va kāra bīja sahitam yuktam sadā viṣṇunā

original: <3.72/2> prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca+ +ghaṭikāḥ citta+ +anvitam dhārayet /
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet
eṣā duḥ saha tāpa pāpa hariṇī syāt āmbhasī dhāraṇā
yat nābhi sthitam indra gopa sa dṛśam bīja tri koṇa anvitam

original: <3.75/11> tattvam tejamayam pradīptam aruṇam rudreṇa yat siddhi+ +dam /
analyzed: tattvam tejamayam pradīptam aruṇam rudreṇa yat siddhi dam

original: <3.75/2> prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca+ +ghaṭikāḥ citta+ +anvitam dhārayet /
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet
eṣā kāla gabhīra bhīti haraṇī vaiśvānarī dhāraṇā
yat bhinna añjana puñja saṃnibham idam dhūmra avabhāsam param

original: <3.77/11> tattvam sattvamayam ya+ +kāra+ +sahitam yatra īśvaraḥ devatā /
analyzed: tattvam sattvamayam ya kāra sahitam yatra īśvaraḥ devatā

original: <3.77/2> prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca+ +ghaṭikāḥ citta+ +anvitam dhārayet /
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet

original: <3.77/3> eṣā khe gamanam karoti yaminām syāt vāyavī dhāraṇā //3.77/
analyzed: eṣā khe gamanam karoti yaminām syāt vāyavī dhāraṇā

original: <3.80/1> yat sindhau vara+ +śuddha+ +vāri+ +sa+ +dṛśam vyomam param bhāsitam /
analyzed: yat sindhau vara śuddha vāri sa dṛśam vyomam param bhāsitam
tattvam deva sadā śivena sahitam bījam ha kāra anvitam

original: <3.80/2> prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca+ +ghaṭikāḥ citta+ +anvitam dhārayet /
analyzed: prāṇam tatra vinīya pañca ghaṭikāḥ citta anvitam dhārayet
eṣā mokṣa kavāṭa bhedana karī tu syāt nabhaḥ dhāraṇā
yaḥ vetti saḥ ca yoga vid
aśvinī paramā mudrā guhya roga vināśinī
na asti mudrā samam kim cit

original: <3.101/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghaṭa+ +stha+ +yoga+ +prakaraṇe mudrā+ +prayogaḥ nāma tṛtīya+ +upadeśaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghaṭa stha yoga prakaraṇe mudrā prayogaḥ nāma tṛtīya upadeśaḥ

original: <4.5/1> śītam vā api tathā ca uṣṇam /
analyzed: śītam vā api tathā ca uṣṇam
su gandhe vā api duḥ gandhe

original: <4.19/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghaṭa+ +stha+ +yoge pratyāhāra+ +prayogaḥ nāma caturtha+ +upadeśaḥ //4//
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghaṭa stha yoge pratyāhāra prayogaḥ nāma caturtha upadeśaḥ
na ati uccam na ati nīcam vā
caitra ādi ca āṣāḍha antam ca
bhujyate sura saṃprītyā su rasam prityā
ati śītam ca ati ca uṣṇam
madhya ahne ca eva sāya ahne
prāk mukhaḥ vā api udak mukhaḥ
prāṇa āyāmāt bodhayet śaktim prāṇa āyāmāt mana unmanī

original: <5.61/1> prāṇaḥ apānaḥ samānaḥ ca udāna+ +vyānau ca vāyavaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ apānaḥ samānaḥ ca udāna vyānau ca vāyavaḥ

original: <5.78/2> na ca rogaḥ na ca kleśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca rogaḥ na ca kleśaḥ

original: <5.100/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghata+ +stha+ +yoga+ +prakaraṇe prāṇa+ +āyāma+ +prayogaḥ nāma pañcama+  #
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghata stha yoga prakaraṇe prāṇa āyāma prayogaḥ nāma pañcama  /
sa ha kṣa ma va la ri yum
ham sa śa ktim yathā kramam
a ka tha ādi rekhā trayam

original: <6.24/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghata+ +stha+ +yoge sapta+ +sādhane dhyāna+ +yogaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭha+ +upadeśaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gheraṇḍa saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa caṇḍa saṃvāde ghata stha yoge sapta sādhane dhyāna yogaḥ nāma ṣaṣṭha upadeśaḥ

original: <7.2/3> dine dine yasya bhavet saḥ yogī /
analyzed: dine dine yasya bhavet saḥ yogī

original: <7.4/1> aham brahma na ca anyaḥ asmi /
analyzed: aham brahma na ca anyaḥ asmi
brahma eva aham na śoka bhāj
aham brahmā iti ca a dvaitam
bhū carāḥ khe carāḥ ca amī

original: <7.24/0> [[iti śrī+ +gheraṇḍa+ +saṃhitāyām gheraṇḍa+ +caṇḍa+ +saṃvāde ghata+ +stha+ +yoga+ +sādhane yogasya sapta+ +sāre samādhi+ +yogaḥ nāma  #
